name: events-splitter
description: Randomly split events from one host (Agent) to multiple hosts (Targets)

scripts.copy-files: mkdir testreport; docker cp Target-2:events.log testreport/target2_events.log; docker cp Target-1:events.log testreport/target1_events.log
scripts.copy-logs: mkdir testreport; docker logs -t Target-2 > testreport/target2_console.log; docker logs -t Target-1 > testreport/target1_console.log; docker logs -t Splitter > testreport/splitter_console.log; docker logs -t Agent > testreport/agent_console.log
scripts.docker-restart: npm run docker-down && npm run docker-up
scripts.pretest: npm run clean-testreport && npm run copy-files && npm run copy-logs

author: Colleen Hobbs
